pageSetting.title: 机构业务量汇总查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '$qsrq$'||'-' || '$jsrq$' tjrq ,t.khdxdh,t.lbmc,t.ywlhj,t.xtzq,t.xtzh,t.sgzq,t.sgzh, t.bcywl,t.zqxjsf,t.zhxjsf,t.qxpm,t.tlpm,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc from ( select ywl.*, f_numtochar(rank() over(order by ywl.ywlhj desc)) as qxpm, f_numtochar(rank() over(partition by ywl.lbmc order by ywl.ywlhj desc)) as tlpm from ( select jg.khdxdh,lb.lbmc, round(sum(ywl.zhywlhj),2) as ywlhj, round(sum(ywl.xtzqywl),2) as xtzq,round(sum(ywl.xtzhywl),2) as xtzh, round(sum(ywl.sgzqywl),2) as sgzq,round(sum(ywl.sgzhywl),2) as sgzh, round(sum(ywl.bcywl),2) as bcywl, round(sum(ywl.zqxjsrl+ywl.zqxjfcl)/10000,2) as zqxjsf,round(sum(ywl.zhxjsrl+ywl.zhxjfcl),2) as zhxjsf from khdx_jg jg inner join nbzz_jgkh_ywl ywl on ywl.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb lb on lb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh group by jg.khdxdh,lb.lbmc ) ywl ) t inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) jg on jg.khdxdh = t.khdxdh where t.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) union all select '合计' tjrq,0 khdxdh,'-' lbmc,round(sum(ywl.zhywlhj),2) as ywlhj,round(sum(ywl.xtzqywl),2) as xtzq, round(sum(ywl.xtzhywl),2) as xtzh,round(sum(ywl.sgzqywl),2) as sgzq,round(sum(ywl.sgzhywl),2) as sgzh, round(sum(ywl.bcywl),2) as bcywl,round(sum(ywl.zqxjsrl+ywl.zqxjfcl)/10000,2) as zqxjsf, round(sum(ywl.zhxjsrl+ywl.zhxjfcl),2) as zhxjsf,'-' qxpm,'-' tlpm,'-' jgdh,'-' jgmc from khdx_jg jg inner join nbzz_jgkh_ywl ywl on ywl.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb lb on lb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$)

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select '$qsrq$'||'-' || '$jsrq$' tjrq ,t.khdxdh,t.lbmc,t.ywlhj,t.xtzq,t.xtzh,t.sgzq,t.sgzh, t.bcywl,t.zqxjsf,t.zhxjsf,t.qxpm,t.tlpm,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc from ( select ywl.*, f_numtochar(rank() over(order by ywl.ywlhj desc)) as qxpm, f_numtochar(rank() over(partition by ywl.lbmc order by ywl.ywlhj desc)) as tlpm from ( select jg.khdxdh,lb.lbmc, round(sum(ywl.zhywlhj),2) as ywlhj, round(sum(ywl.xtzqywl),2) as xtzq,round(sum(ywl.xtzhywl),2) as xtzh, round(sum(ywl.sgzqywl),2) as sgzq,round(sum(ywl.sgzhywl),2) as sgzh, round(sum(ywl.bcywl),2) as bcywl, round(sum(ywl.zqxjsrl+ywl.zqxjfcl)/10000,2) as zqxjsf,round(sum(ywl.zhxjsrl+ywl.zhxjfcl),2) as zhxjsf from khdx_jg jg inner join nbzz_jgkh_ywl ywl on ywl.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb lb on lb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh group by jg.khdxdh,lb.lbmc ) ywl ) t inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) jg on jg.khdxdh = t.khdxdh where t.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) union all select '合计' tjrq,0 khdxdh,'-' lbmc,round(sum(ywl.zhywlhj),2) as ywlhj,round(sum(ywl.xtzqywl),2) as xtzq, round(sum(ywl.xtzhywl),2) as xtzh,round(sum(ywl.sgzqywl),2) as sgzq,round(sum(ywl.sgzhywl),2) as sgzh, round(sum(ywl.bcywl),2) as bcywl,round(sum(ywl.zqxjsrl+ywl.zqxjfcl)/10000,2) as zqxjsf, round(sum(ywl.zhxjsrl+ywl.zhxjfcl),2) as zhxjsf,'-' qxpm,'-' tlpm,'-' jgdh,'-' jgmc from khdx_jg jg inner join nbzz_jgkh_ywl ywl on ywl.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jglb jglb on jglb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh and ywl.tjrq between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join csb_jglb lb on lb.lbdh = jglb.lbdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on jg.khdxdh = qx.khdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) ) t
